11.3.9 Dutiyabhayaverūpasantasutta
Sotāpattisaṃyutta
Saraṇānivagga
Dutiyabhayaverūpasantasutta
1025.
1986Sāvatthinidānaṃ…pe…  “yato kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, imehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho; so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya—  ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto; sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’”ti.
1987Navamaṃ.
